parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes headgear from a unit. If unit has no headgear command quietly fails.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''removeHeadgear''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeHeadgear]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[headgear]], [[addHeadgear]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 5, 2016 - 16:08 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lucky44|Lucky44]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To clarify, this command effectively DELETES the headgear. It does not simply remove it from unit's head and move it into inventory.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
